txt.en: 'Ha! These dwarves call themselves merchants? They trade good beer for a few bowls of pipe-weed!'
'My new friends have brought us our fill of beer...or...are they new friends...? Whatever...cheers to them!'
'Ah, the taste of dwarf-ale puts joy in my heart and a bounce in my step!'
'Come, friend, drink your fill, and tomorrow we'll sleep the day away.'
